data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (cpu_usage_percent IS NULL OR cpu_usage_percent < 85.0) AND (disk_0_percent_usage IS NULL OR disk_0_percent_usage < 90) AND (disk_1_percent_usage IS NULL OR disk_1_percent_usage < 90) AND (memory_usage_percent IS NULL OR memory_usage_percent < 90)) AS 'Health Score' FROM citrix_netscaler_appliance FACET citrix_netscaler_appliance_name
SELECT uniqueCount(citrix_netscaler_appliance_name) AS 'Appliances' FROM citrix_netscaler_appliance FACET system_type
SELECT average(cpu_usage_percent) FROM citrix_netscaler_appliance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(disk_0_percent_usage) FROM citrix_netscaler_appliance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Disk 0 Percent Usage (Percent)
presentation.notes: Used space in /flash partition of the disk, as a percentage.

data.nrql: SELECT average(disk_1_percent_usage) FROM citrix_netscaler_appliance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Disk 1 Percent Usage (Percent)
presentation.notes: Used space in /var partition of the disk, as a percentage.
